title: 2  Todo no empezó en octubre de 2023 (historia de la colonización de Palestina)
text:
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

# No library required for base barplot
counts <- c(5, 10, 15, 20)
barplot(counts,
        main = "Basic Bar Plot",
        xlab = "Categories",
        ylab = "Counts",
        col = "skyblue",
        names.arg = c("A", "B", "C", "D"))









# No library required for base hist
data <- rnorm(1000)
hist(data,
     main = "Histogram of Data",
    xlab = "Values",
    ylab = "Frequency",
    col = "lightgreen",
    border = "darkgreen")
crumbs: 2  Todo no empezó en octubre de 2023 (historia de la colonización de Palestina)
